title: The Topaz Brooch
description: Due to the subject matter (pirates and war), this 700-page raw and intense story comes with a warning of PTSD, violence, profanity, and sex. STARRING: Rick O’Grady and Billie Malone, with David and Kenzie, Pete and Sophia, and introducing Cajun Remy Benoit and special guest stars General Andrew Jackson and the pirate Jean Lafitte.THE ADVENTURE: In New Orleans to speak at the annual conference of the National Association for Catering & Events, former Army Ranger Billie Malone decides to swing by an estate sale, and can’t resist buying a magnificent topaz brooch.Later in the day, while admiring her purchase, she triggers the magic, is whisked back in time to New Orleans in 1814, and is drawn into the Battle of New Orleans…and the escalation of an ancient, ongoing war with powerful, global combatants.
author: Katherine Lowry Logan
